item.title: Street lights out, 5th November
item.description:
Several street lights are out starting from mottingham village going up towards elmstead lane on Mottingham road there are a few not working outside 171 mottingham road going up and down towards the prince of wales pub It’s very dark now and very uncomfortable when leaving my property it’s been like this for about 3weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 158, Mottingham Road, Coldharbour, London

item.title: By the green telephone exchange box, 5th November
item.description:
This spot never seems to be cleaned by the road sweeper. The issue is located next to a green BT (telephone exchange) box positioned against a brick wall on the pavement. It’s beside a gated area where a red bin is visible just behind the gate. The area collects cigarette butts, litter and leaves, and often larger items dumped there by passerbyers. It is consistently missed by the street sweeper. I have reported it several times before, but the issue persists. Could you please ensure this area is included in the regular cleaning schedule going forward? Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salusbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstruction of street, 5th November
item.description:
These building materials have been stored outside the house for several days. If they have been left without permission they should be moved. If permission to use public road space has been provided please ignore the report.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Green Lane, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole outside Asda, 5th November
item.description:
